message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet all your needs and comes highly recommended by our satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $140?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your valuation and am willing to negotiate further. In light of this, I propose we set the product price at $135. This allows us both to reach an agreement that respects the value you see in the product while also ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $128 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose setting the product price at $132. This acknowledges your valuation while also allowing for a reasonable profit margin for me. I believe this price point will help us close the deal.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $125 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we've been able to maintain a dialogue. To accommodate your budget while still ensuring a fair return for us, I propose setting the product price at $127. This represents a compromise that respects both our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a final price of $123 for the product.

I appreciate your efforts to find a suitable price, Bob. In order to ensure a fair transaction for both parties, I propose setting the product price at $125. This price reflects the value you see in the product while also allowing for a reasonable profit margin for us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the current market conditions and my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $122 for the product.
